description:
OSAPI leaves it to the cloud operator to implement Password policy. However this means that OSAPI does not enforce "Default" password policies.
Currently:

   1. Long password (255 chars) is allowed.
   2. Whitespaces, tabs are allowed  in the string.

Im not sure if having a default password policy for OSAPI will take away the flexibility from the cloud operator. However at least a minimum password policy can be enforced.

"adminPass" : "!@#$%&*()90987766544321~aefqweF w'e                          tabs and whitespaces preceded 1233456788903241243aflgjslkvngij10$@#%@#^*(@^@(^@#fajlamva'voae'goa'0385092476-9mc095[0m5v[80[589c[0985[08)owwwwwwwwt8997p9v8pt3-957159757-mciru38962-895170851nlvslkv907609738695n^"

is accepted in the current implementation.
Build: Diablo-4 milestone.
title: Server admin Password does not have a minimum complexity policy
